KE.title: OSI Model - Interactive Exercise Generator
KE.description: This KE unit enables an AI to generate personalized exercises and challenges for learning the OSI 7-layer model, from theoretical knowledge to practical application.
learning_goals: Understand the purpose and function of each OSI layer.
Identify protocols associated with each layer.
Apply OSI-layer reasoning in troubleshooting scenarios.
Distinguish between similar layers (e.g., Transport vs. Network).

progression_structure.focus: Layer names, order, and basic function
Protocol-to-layer mapping, data types per layer

actions.description: Ensure the user can recall the layer names and explain their primary functions.

actions.action: Propose a matching task between protocols and layers
actions.description: Include protocols like HTTP, IP, TCP, ARP, and explain answers afterward.
Describe a fictional network issue and ask the user to identify which OSI layer is likely at fault.
Introduce a layered analogy (postal system, factory) and ask the user to map it to the OSI model.

metadata.preferred_format: Q&A style with brief explanations after each answer
metadata.author: User-generated KE
